item.title: US health body rules collision sports cause CTE in landmark change
item.description: US health body rules collision sports cause CTE in landmark change US National Institutes of Health acknowledge causal linkConcussion in Sport Group conference takes place this weekIn a move that will have ramifications for collision sports, the US National Institutes of Health has formally acknowledged a causal link between repeated blows to the head and the neurodegenerative disease chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE).
